龍門唔係大晒
如果正常爭頂而龍門未接實嘅話係唔一定會foul進攻球員
自己睇下球證點講
http://www.asktheref.com/Soccer%20Rules/Question/26710/
If a player simply jumps to challenge the goalkeeper in the air in the same way as challenging an opponent in the air with the ball available to be challenged for then there is rarely a foul.
Many fouls though that are awarded are for charging or jumping at the goalkeeper in the air. The player usually jumps at the goalkeeper who has his arms in the air catching the ball with the player having little or no hope of heading the ball as it is usually a distance well above the attacker. That is either jumping at or illegal charging of the goalkeeper which are both offences in the same way that it is a free kick if it done by a player on an opponent.
總之想講嘅係呢啲波唔係“正常一定會吹”
